control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs an identified custodian during transport of information system media outside of controlled areas.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization [Selection: restricts; prohibits] the use of [Assignment: organization-defined types of information system media] on [Assignment: organization-defined information systems or system components] using [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards].

Control Statement: The organization employs an identified custodian during transport of information system media outside of controlled areas.
